channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump and Harris Embody a Stark Partisan Divide on Fighting Poverty
item.description: The two presidential candidates can both point to records of pushing poverty rates down, but their approaches could hardly be more different.
